name: Robots Took My Dog
description:
As a slave to your A.I overlords, you have reached a breaking point- when your dog Mr. Puff Diggity was snatched from you while you were on massage duty in a local parlor.

 By the name of Puff Diggity, nobody will stand in my way when I lay my vengeance upon thee.

Press escape, and click on the game screen to lock the cursor. Once locked, press escape again to unlock your cursor.

DISCLAIMER: THIS IS A FIRST TECH DEMO PLAYABLE OF ROBOTS TOOK MY DOG, MORE TO COME.
